definition: (of statements or questions) charged with associative significance and often meant to mislead or influence
details:
adjective
- (of statements or questions) charged with associative significance and often meant to mislead or influence
= example: (of statements or questions) charged with associative significance and often meant to mislead or influence
- very drunk
= synonyms: tight
- filled with a great quantity
= example: filled with a great quantity
= synonyms: laden, ladened
- of weapons, charged with ammunition
= example: of weapons, charged with ammunition
- having an abundant supply of money or possessions of value
= synonyms: flush
